episodes.title: 488: The Way Down: God, Greed, and the Cult of Gwen Shamblin Episode 1
episodes.description: Hey Spooksters! Docuseries recaps are back! Today we will be recapping episode 1 of The Way Down: God, Greed, and the Cult of Gwen Shamblin. This jaw-dropping docuseries examines the rise of the controversial Remnant Fellowship, a weight-loss based Christian church, and its charismatic late founder, Gwen Shamblin Lara.  Control Body Odor ANYWHERE with @lumedeodorant and get $5 off your Starter Pack (that’s over 40% off) with promo code SPOOKEDGIRLS at lumedeodorant.com! #lumepod  Check out the following link for our socials, visit our Patreon,  & more  https://linktr.ee/3spookedgirls  Have a personal true crime story or paranormal encounter you'd like to share with us? Send us an email over to 3spookedgirls@gmail.com  Thank you to Sarah Hester Ross for our intro music!  Thank you to Edward October for our content warning!
